actions.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.3059.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey for scrapping by the National Maritime Museum Association not more than 2 vessels in the National Defense Reserve Fleet that are scheduled to be scrapped.

summary.text: Historic Fleet Restoration Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to convey not more than two vessels in the National Defense Reserve Fleet to the National Maritime Museum Association in San Francisco, California, to be sold for scrap, the proceeds to go for preservation of the historic fleet of the San Francisco Maritime Historical Park.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey for scrapping by the National Maritime Museum Association not more than 2 vessels in the National Defense Reserve Fleet that are scheduled to be scrapped.
